Transform the given sentence into active voice and incorporate additional details about the captain and the news report.
The captain, who is a veteran of the Navy with 25 years of experience and a commendation for bravery, avidly read the latest news report on the Navy's new aircraft carrier. He devoured every detail, from its state-of-the-art technology to its deployment plans. With a firm grasp of the information, he disseminated it to his crew, providing them with valuable insights and analysis. In active voice, describe the captain's process of reading, comprehending, and disseminating the news report on the Navy's new aircraft carrier.

With 25 years of experience and a commendation for bravery, the veteran Navy captain avidly devoured the latest news report on the Navy's new aircraft carrier. He meticulously absorbed every detail, from its state-of-the-art technology to its deployment plans. Armed with a firm grasp of the information, the captain shared his valuable insights and analysis with his crew, ensuring they were well-informed about the latest developments.
